headline: Ask HN: Has anyone else had a problem navigating TRUTH SOCIAL?
description:
Is there a users guide available? I am well versed in Social Media Sites, but even so I find the lack of intuitivity cumbersome. A flow chart would be helpful as would a video presentation of how to use the site.

So far this site has been “All sizzle and no steak” and by that, to me it seems to have all the intimacy of being one of many at a virtual rally instead of mirroring the experience of attending one live where you can share information with people that you can make soft contact with. I am following 1000 people, strangers all, because there is no way to search for and find any of my contacts. As for it not being censored I understand that it is in fear that Apple will remove their APP.

Would reproraming it be an option?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 还有人在浏览TRUTH SOCIAL时遇到了问题吗？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 還有人在瀏覽TRUTH SOCIAL時遇到了問題嗎？
